title: Best of the Program | Guests: Alex Berenson & Brad Meltzer | 6/7/22
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss the politics of California and how they compare to the politics of the rest of America. Author and former investigative reporter Alex Berenson joins to discuss his lawsuit against Twitter. Glenn and Stu discuss forms of energy that work and forms of energy that the Biden administration is pushing.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
